name: Saritsa Charity Trust

address: 3 Pankaj CHS, Sitaram Keer Marg, Mahim (w)

briefDescription: Saritsa Foundation equips and empowers community, especially, women , girls, school children (motherless children , orphaned children, street children, children of laborers ), youth, disabled, older people and citizens to cope with natural and man made disasters like Terrorism, Bomb Blasts, Earthquake ,Cyclone, Flood, Climate Change Environmental degradation, Fire, Chemical, Biological and Nuclear hazards. Saritsa Foundation provides inputs of information, raises awareness and imparts education, practical training by reaching at their “Door Steps” as a “Mobile University”. It has build capacity amongst 2,26,000 people including 10,100 persons with disability in 19 states of rural and urban India.
